docs.snippet: The veteran outfielder and three-time All-Star is a tireless worker for charities and youth programs in the Chicago area, where he grew up, and in New York....
docs.lead_paragraph: The veteran outfielder and three-time All-Star is a tireless worker for charities and youth programs in the Chicago area, where he grew up, and in New York.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column profiles New York Mets outfielder Curtis Granderson, Chicago native who has made it his mission to give back to youth.

headline.main: Curtis Granderson Is a Man on a Generous Mission

docs.snippet: Success in baseball and boxing infused Cubans with a sense of pride and helped give Mr. Castro grounds to taunt and defy the United States, but also exposed financial problems and led to defections....
docs.lead_paragraph: Success in baseball and boxing infused Cubans with a sense of pride and helped give Mr. Castro grounds to taunt and defy the United States, but also exposed financial problems and led to defections.
docs.abstract: Fidel Castro's promotion of athletics, in particular baseball, and Cuba's sports successes during first part of his leadership contributed to sense of pride and provided means of besting American rivals; country's later deterioration, however, was reflected in defection of its best athletes.

headline.main: Under Fidel Castro, Sport Symbolized Cuba’s Strength and Vulnerability
headline.print_headline: Out of Castro’s Love of Sports, Cuban Pride and Vulnerability

docs.snippet: Britain's accounting watchdog has begun an investigation into Grant Thornton's auditing of financial statements published by Sports Direct, it said on Monday, dealing another blow to the troubled sportswear retailer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's accounting watchdog has begun an investigation into Grant Thornton's auditing of financial statements published by Sports Direct, it said on Monday, dealing another blow to the troubled sportswear retailer.

headline.main: UK Accounting Watchdog Investigating Sports Direct Audit
headline.print_headline: UK Accounting Watchdog Investigating Sports Direct Audit

docs.snippet: British sportswear and fashion retailer JD Sports Fashion has purchased Go Outdoors for 112.3 million pounds ($140.4 million), it said on Monday, beefing-up its presence in the outdoor clothing market....

docs.snippet: Australia's Olympic chief John Coates has backed calls for an A$50 million ($37.35 million) lottery to boost funding for sport and keep the country competitive in the face of rising spending by their rivals....

docs.snippet: Silvio Berlusconi's holding company may ask the Chinese investors seeking to buy Italian soccer club AC Milan to make a further downpayment if the deal's closing is postponed, two sources close to the matter told Reuters on Monday....

docs.snippet: German state broadcasters ARD and ZDF said they will not show the Olympic Games for the first time, having failed to clinch a deal to buy broadcast rights from Discovery Communications....

docs.snippet: There are already a few online services that aim to replace cable, but they haven't attracted many users yet. AT&T's DirecTV hopes to change that with a new service announced Monday....
